outputs.output_descr: This proposal supports the High Impact Micro Infrastructure Initiative (HIMII) projects in line with Palestinian national objectives focusing on ready to implement projects in areas A, B, C, in East Jerusalem...agriculture,  land, irrigation, agricultural roads

As part of the Government of Japan's (GoJ) assistance to the Palestinian People, and in particular through its "High Impact Micro-Infrastructure (HIMII) " initiative, 
The project will aim to enhance accessibility to irrigation water in area "C" of the West Bank through the upgrading of related irrigation systems. The intervention will give priority to activities that create the highest positive impact on the value chain for irrigated crops; activities, which can significantly reduce cost and, simultaneously, improve the management of water resources. Related to the works, UNDP/PAPP will also be tasked with the role of procuring needed furniture and equipment, identified jointly and agreed to by the partners.

project_descr: This proposal supports the High Impact Micro Infrastructure Initiative (HIMII) projects in line with Palestinian national objectives focusing on ready to implement projects in areas A, B, C and in East Jerusalem.
